phases.name: Plan
phases.description: Define security goals, requirements, and risk assumptions.

phases.name: Code
phases.description: Implement features with secure coding practices.

phases.name: Build
phases.description: Produce build artifacts and manage dependencies.

phases.name: Test
phases.description: Validate behavior and security properties before release.

phases.name: Deploy
phases.description: Ship and configure software in target environments.

phases.name: Operate
phases.description: Run and maintain services in production.

phases.name: Monitor
phases.description: Detect, analyze, and respond to security signals.

metrics.title: Dependency Vulnerability Rate

thresholds.name: Critical vulns target
thresholds.description: Number of critical vulnerabilities in production dependencies.

metrics.markdown:
# Description
Track the count of critical vulnerabilities present in dependencies at build time.

# Measurement
Count critical CVEs reported by dependency scanning tools for the build.

# Notes
Supports reducing supply-chain exposure before release.

metrics.title: Deployment Hardening Compliance

thresholds.name: Compliance target
thresholds.description: Percentage of environments meeting hardening baseline.

metrics.markdown:
# Description
Measure how many deployment environments meet the defined hardening baseline.

# Measurement
Divide the number of environments passing hardening checks by the total number of environments.

# Notes
Ensures production environments remain aligned with security baselines.

metrics.title: Incident Response Readiness

thresholds.name: Readiness target
thresholds.description: Percentage of services with up-to-date runbooks.

metrics.markdown:
# Description
Measure the percentage of services with current incident response runbooks and on-call coverage.

# Measurement
Count services with reviewed runbooks in the last 6 months divided by total services.

# Notes
Keeps response posture aligned with operational reality.

metrics.title: Secure Code Review Coverage

thresholds.name: Coverage target
thresholds.description: Percentage of pull requests that include a secure review.

metrics.markdown:
# Description
Measure the percentage of pull requests that include a documented secure code review.

# Measurement
Count pull requests marked with a secure review label divided by all merged pull requests.

# Notes
Provides insight into adherence to secure review requirements.

metrics.title: Security Approval Latency
metrics.markdown:
# Description
Track the median time to obtain security approval for release packages.

# Measurement
Measure the time between security review request and approval completion.

# Notes
Helps identify bottlenecks in release governance.

metrics.title: Security Detection Coverage

thresholds.name: Coverage target
thresholds.description: Percentage of critical assets with detection rules.

metrics.markdown:
# Description
Track coverage of security detection rules for critical assets.

# Measurement
Divide the number of critical assets with active detection rules by the total number of critical assets.

# Notes
Ensures monitoring keeps pace with expanding infrastructure.

metrics.title: Security Requirements Coverage

thresholds.name: Coverage target
thresholds.description: Percentage of epics with explicit security requirements.

metrics.markdown:
# Description
Measure how many planned epics or features have explicit security requirements before implementation begins.

# Measurement
Calculate the percentage of epics with at least one security requirement documented in the planning system.

# Notes
Higher coverage reduces late-stage security surprises and rework.

metrics.title: Security Test Coverage

thresholds.name: Coverage target
thresholds.description: Percentage of security test cases executed.

metrics.markdown:
# Description
Measure coverage of security-focused test cases in the test suite.

# Measurement
Calculate the percentage of required security tests executed in CI.

# Notes
Helps ensure regression tests cover known security scenarios.

metrics.title: Threat Model Coverage

thresholds.name: Coverage target
thresholds.description: Percentage of critical features with a threat model.

metrics.markdown:
# Description
Track how many critical features have a documented threat model before implementation begins.

# Measurement
Divide the count of critical features with a threat model by the total number of critical features planned for the release.

# Notes
Helps ensure that high-risk areas are assessed before coding starts.
